pinyin: Bei3 jing1 chan3 quan2 jiao1 yi4 suo3

definition: abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
to own a controlling number of shares in a company
lit. to hang up a plate/to open up for business/listed (on stock market)

definition: consideration (in exchange for shares)/a quid pro quo
see 國務院國有資產監督管理委員會|国务院国有资产监督管理委员会[Guo2 wu4 yuan4 Guo2 you3 Zi1 chan3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
Shenzhen Stock Exchange, abbr. to 深交所[Shen1 Jiao1 suo3]

definition: to undertake to purchase sth/to subscribe (to share issue)
to delist (a traded security)/(sports) to accept a transfer-listed player from another club
